comments.html: OTOH: how many OpenFlow-based production-grade data center fabrics have you seen, and how many of them are still around? The ancients weren't stupid when they decided to go with the distributed protocols.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: ACI could be a lot simpler if it used OpenFlow instead of a tangle of distributed protocols. ;-)
comments.name: Wes Felter
